pages.text: $(li)Slimes are bouncy, cube-shaped hostile creatures that can be found in particular places of the Overworld, or at night in $(l:patchouli:biomes/overworld/swamp/swamp)Swamps$(/l).$(br)$(li)They will jump until arrives you and hits you.$(br)$(li)They may drop $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/slimeball)Slimeballs$(/l) upon death.
